item.title: Curriculum Vitae
item.description: Education 2021-present PhD in Engineering | University of Warwick | United Kingdom 2018-2021 MSc in Power Engineering | Central South University | China 2014-2018 BSc in New Energy Science&Technology | Central South University | China Selected Publications The full list of the publications please refer to google scholar or ResearchGate Journal articles A semi-analytic method for buoyancy-induced thermal stratification in hot water tanks during standby periods | DOI | Applied Thermal Engineering | 2024.
